description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below
full_summary:
**Title** {English and French}
```markdown
Title-Titre-English: Valve, Safety Relief 
Title-Titre-Français: Soupage de sureté et de décharge
```
**Tender Information**
```markdown
Reference Number-Numéro de reference: RW-23-01024309
Solicitation Reference-WXR-Référence sollicitant: PW-23-01024309
Amendment Number-Numéro de la modification: 0
Publication Date-Date de publication: February 1, 2023
Tender Closing Date-Date de clôture des soumissions: March 13, 2023 at 2:00 PM ET
```
**Description and Requirements**
```markdown
The Department of National Defence is inviting proposals to supply Safety Relief Valves to Canadian Forces Bases in Esquimalt and Halifax.  
Valves are to be delivered to the following locations:

- Item 1: 12 each, CFB Esquimalt, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 01-281-5166
- Item 2: 12 each, CFB Halifax, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 01-281-5166

Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids in foreign currencies will be rejected.
```
**Contact and Notifications**
```markdown
Contracting Authority: Department of National Defence
Contracting Entity Contact:
- Name: Jean-Pierre Normandin
- Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
- Phone: 819-939-3674
```
